#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

#define MAXN 10000

long long int m[10002], t[10002], dp[1002][10002][2];

long long int max_ll(long long int a, long long int b){
    if(a > b){
        return a;
    }
    return b;
}

int main(){

    //freopen("input_EXAM.txt", "r", stdin);
    long long int n, i, j, max_t;
    cin>>n>>max_t;
    for(i = 1; i <= n; i++){
        cin>>m[i];
    }

    for(i = 1; i <= n; i++){
        cin>>t[i];
    }

    for(i = 0; i <= n; i++){
        dp[i][0][0] = dp[i][0][1] = 0;
    }

    for(j = 0; j <= max_t; j++){
        dp[0][j][0] = dp[0][j][1] = 0;
    }

    for(i = 1; i <= n; i++){
        for(j = 1; j <= max_t; j++){
            if(j >= t[i]){
                dp[i][j][0] = max(m[i] + dp[i - 1][j - t[i]][0], dp[i - 1][j][0]);
                dp[i][j][1] = max(m[i] + dp[i - 1][j - t[i]][1], max(2 * m[i] + dp[i - 1][j - t[i]][0], dp[i - 1][j][1]));
            }
            else{
                dp[i][j][0] = dp[i - 1][j][0];
                dp[i][j][1] = max(dp[i - 1][j][1], dp[i][j][0]);
            }
        }
    }
    /*
    for(i = 1; i <= n; i++){
        for(j = 1; j <= max_t; j++){
            cout<<dp[i][j][0]<<" ";
        }
        cout<<endl;
    }
    cout<<endl;
    for(i = 1; i <= n; i++){
        for(j = 1; j <= max_t; j++){
            cout<<dp[i][j][1]<<" ";
        }
        cout<<endl;
    }
    */

    cout<<dp[n][max_t][1]<<endl;
    return 0;
}
